verses.verse: At that <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> the <S%G5068>tetrarch<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G189>news<s%> about <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%>

and <S%G3004>said<s%> to his <S%G3816>servants,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> is <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist;<s%> he has <S%G1453>risen<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead;<s%> and that is <S%G1223>why<s%> <S%G1411>miraculous<s%> <S%G1411>powers<s%> are at <S%G1754>work<s%> in him."

For when <S%G2264>Herod<s%> had <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2902>arrested,<s%> he <S%G1210>bound<s%> him, and <S%G659>put<s%> him in <S%G5438>prison<s%> on <S%G1223>account<s%> of <S%G2266>Herodias,<s%> the <S%G1135>wife<s%> of his <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G5376>Philip.<s%>
For <S%G2491>John<s%> had been <S%G3004>saying<s%> to him, "It is not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for you to <S%G2192>have<s%> her."

And although he <S%G2309>wanted<s%> to <S%G615>put<s%> him to <S%G615>death,<s%> he <S%G5399>feared<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G2192>regarded<s%> him as a <S%G4396>prophet.<s%>

But when <S%G2264>Herod<s%>'s <S%G1077>birthday<s%> <S%G1096>came,<s%> the <S%G2364>daughter<s%> of <S%G2266>Herodias<s%> <S%G3738>danced<s%> <S%G1722>before<s%> <S%G3319><s%> [them] and <S%G700>pleased<s%> Herod.
<S%G3606>Thereupon<s%> he <S%G3670>promised<s%> with an <S%G3727>oath<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> her <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> she <S%G154>asked.<s%>

And having been <S%G4264>prompted<s%> by her <S%G3384>mother,<s%> she <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G1325>"Give<s%> me <S%G5602>here<s%> on a <S%G4094>platter<s%> the <S%G2776>head<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist.<s%>"

And although he was <S%G3076>grieved,<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G2753>commanded<s%> [it] to be <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of his <S%G3727>oaths,<s%> and because of his <S%G4873>dinner<s%> <S%G4873>guests.<s%>
And he <S%G3992>sent<s%> and had <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G607>beheaded<s%> in the <S%G5438>prison.<s%>
And his <S%G2776>head<s%> was <S%G5342>brought<s%> on a <S%G4094>platter<s%> and <S%G1325>given<s%> to the <S%G2877>girl;<s%> and she <S%G5342>brought<s%> [it] to her <S%G3384>mother.<s%>

And his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G142>took<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> the <S%G4430>body<s%> and <S%G2290>buried<s%> it; and they <S%G2064>went<s%> and <S%G518>reported<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> [it,] He <S%G402>withdrew<s%> from <S%G1564>there<s%> in a <S%G4143>boat,<s%> to a <S%G2048>lonely<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> by <S%G2398>Himself;<s%> and when the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> [of this,] they <S%G190>followed<s%> Him on <S%G3979>foot<s%> from the <S%G4172>cities.<s%>

And when He <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1831>ashore,<s%> He <S%G3708>saw<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> and <S%G4697>felt<s%> <S%G4697>compassion<s%> for them, and <S%G2323>healed<s%> their <S%G732>sick.<s%>

And when it was <S%G3798>evening,<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "The <S%G5117>place<s%> is <S%G2048>desolate,<s%> and the <S%G5610>time<s%> is <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G3928>past;<s%> <S%G3767>so<s%> <S%G630>send<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G630>away,<s%> that they may <S%G565>go<s%> into the <S%G2968>villages<s%> and <S%G59>buy<s%> <S%G1033>food<s%> for <S%G1438>themselves.<s%>"
But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "They do not <S%G5532>need<s%> to <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G565>away;<s%> you <S%G1325>give<s%> them [something] to <S%G2068>eat!<s%>"
And they <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "We <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G3756>only<s%> <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> and <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2486>fish.<s%>"
And He <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5342>"Bring<s%> them <S%G5602>here<s%> to Me."

And <S%G2753>ordering<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> to <S%G347>recline<s%> on the <S%G5528>grass,<s%> He <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> and the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2486>fish,<s%> and <S%G308>looking<s%> up <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> He <S%G2127>blessed<s%> [the food,] and <S%G2806>breaking<s%> the <S%G740>loaves<s%> He <S%G1325>gave<s%> them to the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> [gave] to the <S%G3793>multitudes,<s%>

and they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2068>ate,<s%> and were <S%G5526>satisfied.<s%> And they <S%G142>picked<s%> up <S%G3588>what<s%> was <S%G4052>left<s%> <S%G4052>over<s%> of the <S%G2801>broken<s%> <S%G2801>pieces,<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> <S%G2894>baskets.<s%>
And there were <S%G5616>about<s%> <S%G4000>five<s%> <S%G4000>thousand<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> who <S%G2068>ate,<s%> <S%G5565>aside<s%> from <S%G1135>women<s%> and <S%G3813>children.<s%>

And <S%G2112>immediately<s%> He <S%G315>made<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1684>get<s%> into the <S%G4143>boat,<s%> and <S%G4254>go<s%> <S%G4254>ahead<s%> of Him to the <S%G4008>other<s%> <S%G4008>side,<s%> <S%G2193>while<s%> He <S%G630>sent<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G630>away.<s%>

And after He had <S%G630>sent<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G630>away,<s%> He <S%G305>went<s%> up to the <S%G3735>mountain<s%> by <S%G2398>Himself<s%> to <S%G4336>pray;<s%> and when it was <S%G3798>evening,<s%> He was <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G3441>alone.<s%>

But the <S%G4143>boat<s%> was <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4712>stadia<s%> <S%G568>away<s%> from the <S%G1093>land,<s%> <S%G928>battered<s%> by the <S%G2949>waves;<s%> for the <S%G417>wind<s%> was <S%G1727>contrary.<s%>
And in the <S%G5067>fourth<s%> <S%G5438>watch<s%> of the <S%G3571>night<s%> He <S%G2064>came<s%> to them, <S%G4043>walking<s%> on the <S%G2281>sea.<s%>

And when the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> Him <S%G4043>walking<s%> on the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> they were <S%G5015>frightened,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "It is a <S%G5326>ghost!<s%>" And they <S%G2896>cried<s%> out for <S%G5401>fear.<s%>
But <S%G2117>immediately<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2293>"Take<s%> <S%G2293>courage,<s%> it is I; do not be <S%G5399>afraid.<s%>"
And <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> Him and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> it is You, <S%G2753>command<s%> me to <S%G2064>come<s%> to You on the <S%G5204>water.<s%>"

And He <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2064>"Come!<s%>" And <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2597>got<s%> out of the <S%G4143>boat,<s%> and <S%G4043>walked<s%> on the <S%G5204>water<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>toward<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

But <S%G991>seeing<s%> the <S%G417>wind,<s%> he became <S%G5399>afraid,<s%> and <S%G757>beginning<s%> to <S%G2670>sink,<s%> he <S%G2896>cried<s%> out, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> me!"

And <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1614>stretched<s%> out His <S%G5495>hand<s%> and <S%G1949>took<s%> <S%G1949>hold<s%> of him, and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "O you of <S%G3640>little<s%> <S%G3640>faith,<s%> <S%G1519>why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> did you <S%G1365>doubt<s%>?"
And when they <S%G305>got<s%> into the <S%G4143>boat,<s%> the <S%G417>wind<s%> <S%G2869>stopped.<s%>
And <S%G3588>those<s%> who were in the <S%G4143>boat<s%> <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "You are <S%G230>certainly<s%> God's <S%G5207>Son!<s%>"
And when they had <S%G1276>crossed<s%> <S%G1276>over,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G1093>land<s%> at <S%G1082>Gennesaret.<s%>

And when the <S%G435>men<s%> of that <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G1921>recognized<s%> Him, they <S%G649>sent<s%> into <S%G3650>all<s%> that <S%G4066>surrounding<s%> <S%G4066>district<s%> and <S%G4374>brought<s%> to Him <S%G3956>all<s%> who were <S%G2560>sick;<s%>

and they [began] to <S%G3870>entreat<s%> Him that they might <S%G3441>just<s%> <S%G681>touch<s%> the <S%G2899>fringe<s%> of His <S%G2440>cloak;<s%> and as <S%G3745>many<s%> as <S%G681>touched<s%> [it] were <S%G1295>cured.<s%>
